cn.title: 关于防范 "虚假比特派官网" 的声明

message.data: 近期，经用户反馈，我们发现多家骗子网站仿冒 Bitpie 官网，开展相应业务，试图骗取用户资产。

假冒比特派官网：https://www.bitpietvc.com/[假]、https://www.bitpieex.com/[假]、https://www.bitpiext.com/[假]、http://ynyplqz.com/[假]、https://otcbidding.com/[假]、https://www.bitpei.com/[假]、https://bitepai.pro[假]、https://bitpie.im[假]、https://appbitpie.com/m.html[假]、https://cnbitpie.com/[假]、https://www.bitpie118.com[假]、http://bitpie.org [假]http://bitpie.org [假]、www.bitpie168.vip [假]、www.bitpie18.com [假]、http://wap.hfyjy.net/index.html[假]、https://bitepie.bid[假]
请大家对虚假信息予以警惕，不要在任何网站输入助记词，也不要把助记词透露给任何人，谨防资产损失。
下载安装 Bitpie，请大家认准 Bitpie 官网：bitpie.com。不要通过百度等搜索引擎搜索下载，请访问官网直接下载

如何判断自己是否受影响？请按以下方式自查是否为正版 Bitpie：
1.Google Play：请确认所下载的 Bitpie 开发者为 getcai ，除此以外，其他所有 Bitpie App 均为假冒应用；
2. App Store：请确认所下载的 Bitpie 开发者为 BITPIE HK LIMITED，除此以外，其他所有 Bitpie App 均为假冒应用；
3. 其他渠道：请谨慎防范任何与 Bitpie 官网（bitpie.com）相似的网址，从非官网渠道下载的均存在巨大风险。
可能受影响的用户该怎么办？
1. 请立即停用在此期间创建或导入过假 Bitpie App 的钱包的地址。
2. 从 Bitpie 官网 bitpie.com 重新下载安装 Bitpie 并创建新钱包。
3. 将存在风险的钱包地址中的资产尽快转至新钱包地址。
同时，如果你发现了类似骗局，请通过邮件 service@bitpie.com 反馈给我们，感谢您的支持。
比特派团队
Dear users:
Recently, we found that many scam page imitated Bitpie's official website in an attempt to defraud users' assets.

Fake Bitpie official websites:https://www.bitpietvc.com/[false]、https://www.bitpieex.com/[false]、https://www.bitpiext.com/[false]、http://ynyplqz.com/[false]、https://otcbidding.com/[false]、https://www.bitpei.com/[false]、https://bitepai.pro[false]、https://bitpie.im[false]、https://appbitpie.com/html[false]、https://cnbitpie.com/[false]、https://www.bitpie118.com[false]、http://bitpie.org [false]、http://bitpie.org [false]、www.bitpie168.vip [false]、www.bitpie18.com [false]、http://wap.hfyjy.net/index.html[false]、https://bitepie.bid[false]
Please be alert to false information, do not enter mnemonic phases on any website, and do not disclose the mnemonic words to anyone to prevent asset loss.
*Download and install Bitpie on the official Bitpie websites: bitpie.com
How do you check whether you are affected?
Please check in the following ways:
1. Check the developer account when installing the Bitpie APP on APP Store or Play Store. The developer of the Bitpie APP is BITPIE HK LIMITED, and the others are counterfeit apps.
2. The Bitpie APP is not available in mainland China, and the Bitpie APPs on APP Store in mainland China are all counterfeit apps.
3. Other channels: Please be careful to prevent any URLs similar to Bitpie's official website (bitpie.com), and downloads from non-official channels have high risk.
What should the users who may be affected do?
1. Please immediately deactivate the addresses of wallets that have created or imported to fake Bitpie App during this period.
2. Re-download and install Bitpie from Bitpie's official website bitpie.com and create a new wallet.

3. Transfer the assets in the risky wallet address to the new wallet address as soon as possible.  At the same time, if you find a similar scam, please send us an email to service@bitpie.com, thank you for your support.

Bitpie team
August, 16, 2022
